int-app-basic.description: Basic Internet Application with an intuitive UI (User-Interface) with integrated Client-Side Data capabilities. Webelistics goal in design, look, and feel of all builds is to exceed all expectations in professionally implementing our customers requirements; delivering quality engineered software!
